研究揭示了有益的肠道微生物如何分解健康的粘液已经对肠道下部发现的微生物进行了全面的分析，并发现其重点饮食将糖锁定在粘液中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-reveals-how-beneflic--beneflic-gut-gut-microbe-break-break-down-down-mucus-for for-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-reveals-how-beneflic--beneflic-gut-gut-microbe-break-break-break-down-mucus-for-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87422134-A929-48A7-AD24-4EEB955511343 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 06:53:58 -0500 Study reveals how beneficial gut microbe breaks down mucus for health
新研究挑战母亲在怀孕期间的健康与自闭症风险之间的联系尽管许多研究报告了怀孕期间母亲的健康状况与孩子的自闭症风险之间的联系，但一项新的研究表明，几乎所有这些“关联”否则可以通过遗传学，暴露于污染和进入等因素来解释卫生保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-study-challenges-link-link-bet-mothers-mothers-health-dring-pregnancy-and-autism-----aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/new-study-challenges-link-link-bet-mothers-health-dring-pregnancy-and-autism-------------aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A9A36332-9517-4634-A4F8-C8-C8AFDADEB4B8 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 06:26:19 -0500 New study challenges link between mother's health during pregnancy and autism risk
